Application_-_Generate_Questions.description: Triggered By the Submit or a change of Support item

parameters.fetchXml:
<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="true">
  <entity name="leidos_applicationquestion">
    <attribute name="leidos_applicationquestionid" />
    <attribute name="leidos_question" />
    <attribute name="createdon" />
    <order attribute="leidos_question" descending="false" />
    <link-entity name="leidos_applicationquestion_leidos_suppo" from="leidos_applicationquestionid" to="leidos_applicationquestionid" visible="false" intersect="true">
      <link-entity name="leidos_supportitem" from="leidos_supportitemid" to="leidos_supportitemid" alias="aj">
        <link-entity name="leidos_project" from="leidos_supportitemtype" to="leidos_supportitemid" link-type="inner" alias="ak">
          <link-entity name="leidos_application" from="leidos_applicationid" to="leidos_parentapplication" link-type="inner" alias="al">
            <filter type="and">
              <condition attribute="leidos_applicationid" operator="eq" uiname="JamesÂ Freel" uitype="leidos_application" value="@{triggerOutputs()?['body/leidos_applicationid']}" />
            </filter>
          </link-entity>
        </link-entity>
      </link-entity>
    </link-entity>
  </entity>
</fetch>

Get_List_of_Questions_from_All_Projects.description: Get a List of the Questions fpr all Projects associated with this Application

parameters.fetchXml:
<fetch top="200" distinct="true" >
  <entity name="leidos_applicationanswer" >
    <filter>
      <condition attribute="leidos_parentapplication" operator="eq" value="@{triggerOutputs()?['body/leidos_applicationid']}" />
      <condition attribute="leidos_question" operator="eq" value="@{items('Apply_to_each')?['leidos_applicationquestionid']}" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

Apply_to_each.description: Check if the Question already exists, if so skip it
